description: The topics for the module may be revised each time it is offered. In general, the topics will be in the area of Management of Technology, with a focus or bias on more recent developments in this area and/or topics that are specialized in nature. Example topics include 'Techno- Economics' and different types of innovation. For AY09/10, the topic to be covered is 'Techno-Economic Systems'.
preclusion: Case by case basis. For AY09/10, there are no preclusions.
title: Topics in Management of Technology - Techno-Economics Systems
